channel.title: Analyses on My Math Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Analyses on My Math Notes

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Introduction (English)

Welcome to my Real Analysis notes in English. This site supports LaTeX, for example:

$$\int_0^1 x^2 , dx = \left[\frac{x^3}{3}\right]_0^1 = \frac{1}{3}.$$

Try switching to Farsi using the language toggle in the header.

item.title: Chapter 1: Sequences
item.description:
Sequences

Here is a theorem about convergence:

Theorem 1.1: Every Cauchy sequence in a complete metric space is convergent.

To reference this theorem from another page, you can link to [Theorem 1.1](#theorem-1.1) or a fully qualified URL for cross-page references.
